recipesJson.name: Candy Cane ice cream
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: This is just a simple candy cane ice cream. The crepe de menthe gives a bit more mint to the mix. I like the mix of the two ice creams for a more creamy ice cream flavor. Mixed at 70/30 add sweetener if you like. Simple and very delicious.
